2301025.text: Enhance your dolls first to prepare for the unknown danger that lies ahead.

2301026.text: To confront the unpredictable enemies, enhance your dolls.

2301035.text: Friends Assist will be restored to the maximum times once you've cleared a stage.

2301036.text: Tap the icon in the top right to pause the game.

2301037.text: When paused, tap the character avatars at the bottom of the screen to check skill descriptions.

2301038.text: Tap Retreat to exit the combat and return to the Hall of Origin.

2301039.text: Accepted commissions can be managed on the <color=#FFB252>Commission Board</color>.

2301040.text: Tap to claim your Commission Rewards.

2301043.text: You can check current quests and the map of the current region here.

2301045.text: Adjust your team to decide the formation of your dolls in combats.

2301046.text: Now, let's add a front-row doll to the team.

2301001.text: Managing your energy usage during combats is the key to victory.

2301005.text: Once the monster's current Health bar drops to 0, it will enter Weakened status.

2301006.text: In its Weakened status, the monster can't move and all damages dealt to it will be doubled.

2301007.text: Tap the Auto icon at upper right to start Auto Combat.

2301008.text: In Auto Combat, skills will be activated automatically when there is enough energy.

2301009.text: You can always choose to use energy according to your skill releasing arrangement by tapping Skill Arrangement.

2301010.text: Check your skills in the Witch Profile.

2301011.text: Switch skills on the Skill menu.

2301012.text: The selected skill will be available in combats after switching.

2301014.text: [Witch Courtyard] unlocked. Enter it from the main screen.

2301015.text: Tap Acceleration icon to accelerate the combat speed to twice as fast.

2301016.text: Hold the [Enhance] icon to Quick Enhance the doll.

2301017.text: Master, please proceed with your exploration in the tower.

2301019.text: Master, welcome back to the Hall of Origin. Allow me to introduce you to the new features.

2301020.text: Tap your <color=#FFB252>Avatar</color> to adjust various options.

2301021.text: <color=#FFB252>Adventure</color> will improve your knowledge of this world, and unravel your puzzles.

2301022.text: Here is the <color=#FFB252>Doll</color> menu, where you can check all stats of the Dolls.

2301023.text: You can form your adventure team here.

2301024.text: All trophies are collected in the <color=#FFB252>Workshop</color>. You can check them any time.

2301034.text: Friends Assist allows you to summon a doll from your friend to launch an attack. Limited to once in each combat.

2301049.text: Master, try equipping your newly acquired weapon.

2301054.text: Now, let's start enhancing the equipment.

2301055.text: The vessel hanging on your belt is packed with souls. Please summon them in the Hall of Origin.

2301058.text: Tap <color=#FFB252>Summon Again</color> to repeat Summon x10. Tap <color=#FFB252>Finish Summoning</color> to stop the process and confirm the result of the summoning.

2301060.text: Pray Quests refresh daily. Tap to claim your rewards.

2301061.text: Tap here to enter the Adventure menu.

2301062.text: Explore the Dreamworld to acquire abundant materials.

2301064.text: Welcome to the Shop. You can purchase supplies for your adventure here.

2301065.text: This is the <color=#FFB252>Hot Items</color> menu. Do check it often as you don't want to miss out on the recommended items.

2301066.text: Now, let's have a look at the <color=#FFB252>Groceries</color>.

2301067.text: You can redeem <color=#FFB252>Materials</color> with all kinds of currencies acquired from explorations.

2301068.text: This is the <color=#FFB252>Costume</color> menu for the dolls.

2301069.text: You can select various looks for your favorite dolls.

2301070.text: That will be it. Enjoy your shopping.

2301071.text: Master, when you were exploring, a new feature was unlocked in the Hall of Origin.

2301073.text: Tap to check the <color=#FFB252>Magic Tree</color> feature.

2301074.text: Tap to unlock the Firefly Lampstand.

2301076.text: Tap to check the <color=#FFB252>Firefly Lampstand</color> feature.

2301077.text: Catch more Fireflies and collect the Light of Fireflies.

2301079.text: Enter the Magic Tree feature menu.

2301080.text: Tap here to unlock the Mirror of the Otherworld feature.

2301081.text: Tap to check the <color=#FFB252>Mirror of the Otherworld</color> feature.

2301082.text: You can dispatch dolls to explore and collect resources for you.

2301083.text: Master, enemies ahead are even stronger. Be fully prepared before proceeding with your adventure.

2301084.text: Master, you might want to take a short break here. A new feature has been unlocked in the Hall of Origin.

2301085.text: Tap the icon to check the Friends feature.

2301086.text: You can add new friends, and designate an Assist Doll to help other witches.

2301088.text: Select Assist Doll to make combat easier.

2301091.text: You can challenge the powerful enemies that you have defeated in your adventure repeatedly.

2301092.text: Defeat them using less time than before to get great rewards.

2301093.text: Master, by improving your bond with the dolls, you will be able to increase their strength.

2301094.text: Try sending a gift to a doll.

2301095.text: Clear a stage to unlock the Auto Explore feature.

2301096.text: The doll has reached the Max Level. Now try to Ascend the doll.

2301099.text: Dolls' Max Level will be increased after Ascension.

2301101.text: Tap here to enter the Intangible Barrier.

2301103.text: Tap <color=#FFB252>Challenge</color> to challenge the Intangible Barrier.

2301104.text: Alchemy converts basic materials into advanced items.

2301106.text: Add an Assistant to increase the drop rate of byproducts.

2301107.text: As you become more proficient, the drop rate of byproducts will also increase.

2301109.text: You can decorate it however you like.

2301110.text: Dolls resting in the cottage can gradually restore Energy.

2301111.text: You might purchase desired furniture pieces in the Furniture Shop.

2301112.text: You can return to the Hall of Origin at any time. The Intangible Barrier will save the Exploration Progress for you.

2301113.text: You can reset the Exploration Progress here.

2301114.text: Tap on an adjacent area to move.

2301115.text: Defeat the ultimate monster to proceed to the next stage.

2301116.text: Return to the Hall of Origin and use the Music Box of Time.

2301117.text: Master, a new path has revealed itself in the Chrono Tower.

2301119.text: Master, a new feature has been unlocked in the Hall of Origin.

2301120.text: Tap here to enter the Adventure menu.

2301123.text: Use <color=#FFCA65>Wind Cutter</color> to deal Physical DMG to all enemies.

2301124.text: You have 5 Soul Marks now. Unleash them to restore all the Chaos and Order Energy, and triple Order Energy's increase rate for 5 seconds.

2301125.text: After the energy burst, there will be a 15-second Energy Drained state, during which Soul Marks cannot be obtained.

2301126.text: Tap here to switch to Speed x2.

2301127.text: Tap here to switch to Auto Combat.

2301128.text: Tap the Skill icon to switch to the Auto Release of skill.

2301129.text: Restore Health for the ally with the lowest Health by using <color=#FFCA65>Whisper of Flower</color>.

2301133.text: The Intangible Barrier locates on the margin of chronospaces.$B$Being blessed with the power of the Protector, you can explore the Intangible Barrier now.

2301134.text: You will encounter all kinds of events in the Intangible Barrier. $B$The increasingly difficult battles can be dealt with by stacking up various<color=#FFCA65>buffs</color>.

2301135.text: Rewards are reset every Thursday at 4:00 (UTC/GMT+8). $B$The more checkpoints you pass, the better the rewards are.

2301137.text: When the <color=#FFCA65>Swift Rune</color> is active, the witch's speed is boosted.

2301139.text: When the <color=#FFCA65>Sneak Rune</color> is active, the witch will not be detected by monsters.

2301140.text: You obtained a memory segment in the turbulence of chronospaces. Check it out!

2301144.text: The Backup Doll feature is unlocked.

2301145.text: Let's add a Backup doll to the team!

2301146.text: Select a Backup doll and tap Confirm.

2301147.text: On the Character Bond page, you can check the interesting stories of the characters, listen to their voices, and interact with them in multiple ways.

2301148.text: Switch to different menus with the Feature Tabs on the right. Now, let's try to interact with characters!

2301149.text: When you tap a doll, different responses will be made.

2301150.text: Send a gift to a doll of your choice.

2301151.text: Sending gifts will strengthen your bond with the doll and unlock the doll's story.

2301152.text: Different dolls have different gift preferences.

2301153.text: When the Bond with a doll reaches a certain level, you will receive all types of gifts from the doll. Keep your gifts coming!

2301154.text: Tap to check the gifts from the dolls.

2301162.text: During your adventures, you can collect materials used for unlocking skills.

2301163.text: Unlock skills to make your dolls more powerful.

2301164.text: Place your favorite doll in the Hall of Origin.

2301166.text: Use <color=#FFCA65>Mind's Eye</color> to stun an enemy. Stop the Succubus from casting a spell.

2301168.text: Defeat the elite or ultimate monster of a stage to get a blessing reward.

2301172.text: Auto Explore is now available. Tap the button to start.

2301173.text: A Soul Mark can be gained after using a Chaos Energy skill. At 5 Marks, the Energy Outbreak mode will be activated.
